titles.title: A concurrent resolution calling for the release of Yang Wei.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary: 9/16/1987--Introduced. Declares that: (1) the People's Republic of China should immediately release Yang Wei and provide compensation for his illegal detention; and (2) the U.S. Government should offer Chinese students studying in the United States participation in the Extended Voluntary Departure Program.
